sign_of_the_cross.latin: In nomine Patris, et Filii, et Spiritus Sancti. Amen.
sign_of_the_cross.english: In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.

penitential_act.latin: Confiteor Deo omnipotenti et vobis, fratres, quia peccavi nimis cogitatione, verbo, opere et omissione: mea culpa, mea culpa, mea maxima culpa.
penitential_act.english: I confess to almighty God and to you, my brothers and sisters, that I have greatly sinned, in my thoughts and in my words, in what I have done and in what I have failed to do, through my fault, through my fault, through my most grievous fault.

kyrie.latin: Kyrie eleison. Christe eleison. Kyrie eleison.
kyrie.english: Lord have mercy. Christ have mercy. Lord have mercy.

gloria.latin: Gloria in excelsis Deo et in terra pax hominibus bonae voluntatis...
gloria.english: Glory to God in the highest, and on earth peace to people of good will...

creed.latin: Credo in unum Deum, Patrem omnipotentem, factorem caeli et terrae, visibilium omnium et invisibilium...
creed.english: I believe in one God, the Father almighty, maker of heaven and earth, of all things visible and invisible...

offertory.english: Blessed are you, Lord God of all creation...

sanctus.latin: Sanctus, Sanctus, Sanctus Dominus Deus Sabaoth. Pleni sunt caeli et terra gloria tua. Hosanna in excelsis. Benedictus qui venit in nomine Domini. Hosanna in excelsis.
sanctus.english: Holy, Holy, Holy Lord God of hosts. Heaven and earth are full of your glory. Hosanna in the highest. Blessed is he who comes in the name of the Lord. Hosanna in the highest.

lords_prayer.latin: Pater noster, qui es in caelis...
lords_prayer.english: Our Father, who art in heaven...

agnus_dei.latin: Agnus Dei, qui tollis peccata mundi, miserere nobis...
agnus_dei.english: Lamb of God, you take away the sins of the world, have mercy on us...

dismissal.english: Go forth, the Mass is ended.
